title: FS: 2 tough Polar Bears; Eddie Collins
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: FS: 2 tough Polar Bears; Eddie Collins
posts.post_content:
When I put together a T206 Polar Bear subset, Joe Doyle and Irv Young were among the final cards I was able to find. Purely anecdotal, I know, so take it for what it's worth. Was able to upgrade recently, hence the reason they're for sale. The Eddie Collins was recently graded and comes from a raw collection of a longtime collector. Color looks a bit washed out in my scan. The background is more vibrant in person.

Eddie Collins, SGC 60/5: $335

Joe Doyle. BVG 3: SOLD

Irv Young, PSA 2.5: $50

Prices delivered within the United States.

PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol dot com [/URL]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/eddie-collins.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/doyle-pb.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/irv-young-pb.jpg[/IMG]

Hi Rob

I'll take the Doyle if it is still available.


Thanks

Jantz
